creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: multi-colored printed map of Kyoto, featuring blocks of buildings, mountains, rivers, temples, castles, and other geographic and cultural landmarks; small fold-out insert at bottom; folds into itself, and is self-contained in a yellowish folder
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Map of Kyoto and its Suburbs
